entry.title: User vote in blocksize through fees
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Eric Lombrozo and Jeff Garzik on June 14, 2015, they discussed the economic consequences of BIP100 and the potential for corruption among miners. Lombrozo suggests having a Chief Scientist or Technical Advisory Board decide on proper fees, decentralization levels, and growth factors as an alternative to BIP100. Garzik is a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist at BitPay, Inc.
